name: Bad Rivals
description:
Information: Theme was two so we made a game about two rivals that use Health of their buddy as Mana.

Story:

Nelligark, the ghost of an ancient Necromancer wanted himself a new body, however new body belonged to Kellymor, who was a dark knight before his death.

This unholy combination made it impossible for Nelligark to posses Kellymor, and yet it chained them together.

When one dies so will the other, and only the treasure on top of the Tower of Death can undo this link.

And so they begin their journey while trying to keep their murderous urges to themself.

External assets used:
Sounds from: https://freesound.org/

Music (Sicilian Cafe) from: https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/mood/happy/

Made with Unity
